types.section:
{{fr-noun|m}}

# an [[aperitif]] taken in the afternoon, combined with some [[snack]]s, serving as an alternative to [[dinner]]
types.html:
apéritif dinatoire m (plural apéritifs dinatoires)

  1. an aperitif taken in the afternoon, combined with some snacks, serving as an alternative to dinner
trans: an aperitif taken in the afternoon, combined with some snacks, serving as an alternative to dinner
